title: DJT Stock Begins Trading as Trump Owns Majority of $8.4 Billion Media Company
summary: Trump Media begins trading under ticker DJT at $8.4 billion valuation, with Trump holding 69-78.75% of shares, creating unprecedented presidential conflict of interest through media and financial entanglement. Trading was volatile, with stock price jumping over 50% and trading briefly halted.

sources.title: Truth Social surges in DJT stock debut
DJT stock creates unique new ethical nightmare
Trump Media stock jumps as much as 50% after DJT ticker debut
sources.description: Detailed coverage of initial trading day, stock volatility, and ownership structure

sources.title: Trump Media & Technology Group Corp. (DJT) SEC Filings
sources.description: Official SEC filing repository for company financial disclosures

notes: First time in history a presidential candidate owns publicly traded media company. Stock valuation and trading volume demonstrate significant market speculation. Potential for unprecedented conflicts of interest through media ownership and foreign investment.
